46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Az-Zuhri said:"Amrah said, narrating from 'Aishah, may Allah be pleased with her, that the Messenger of Allah cut off the hand of a thief for a quarter of a Dinar

chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from Az-Zuhri
